channel.title: Can i get my account back?
channel.description: I played on an old account, snowballman85... I remember the password, but i put in a random birthday. When i try to log in it prompts me for my bday. How can i get it back? Is it possible?

item.title: Can i get my account back?
item.dc:creator: @jesus_pwns_zezima jesus pwns zezima
item.description:
@jesus_pwns_zezima wrote:

lol i always put in my birthday then for year i put my brothers incase i need to be old but im doing that recently so i still cant get back old np acc =P

Read full topic

item.title: Can i get my account back?

item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

Brute force your birthday, haha

I put in January 1 because it saves me the trouble of remembering

item.title: Can i get my account back?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I’m afraid there probably isn’t a way to get your account back unless you know the birthday. I’m not sure as I don’t play neopets, but when you sign up on there do they prompt you for an email address? If so then you should be able to recover it some how using it.

Read full topic
